issue.title: [Java] Support range searcher
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6013](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6013). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For a sorted vector, the range searcher finds the first/last occurrence of a particular element. 

The search is based on binary search, which takes O(logn) time.
